description.en:
Ever wanted to have some vehicles follow you around the map? With "Follow Me" you can (though not backwards driving).
Changelog (1.2.1.40) - Translations updated by contributors. - Support for baler-and-wrapper combination; FBP 3135 (Kuhn DLC). - Increased starting distance to 20, from 10. - Fix for saving/loading distance and offset between savegame-sessions.
Default control keys:
'Myself' is the current vehicle RIGHT-CTRL F = Toggle 'FollowMe' on/off RIGHT-CTRL H = Wait/Resume RIGHT-CTRL W/S = Distance increase/decrease RIGHT-CTRL A/D = Offset left/right adjust RIGHT-CTRL X = Offset reset or hold for invert
'Behind' the followed vehicle RIGHT-SHIFT F = Disengage 'FollowMe' RIGHT-SHIFT H = Wait/Resume RIGHT-SHIFT W/S = Distance increase/decrease RIGHT-SHIFT A/D = Offset left/right adjust RIGHT-SHIFT X = Offset reset or hold for invert
description.de:
Sie wollten schon immer einigen Fahrzeugen über die Karte folgen können? Mit "Follow Me" können Sie das (natürlich nur vorwärtsfahrend).
Changelog (1.2.1.40) - Translations updated by contributors. - Support for baler-and-wrapper combination; FBP 3135 (Kuhn DLC). - Increased starting distance to 20, from 10. - Fix for saving/loading distance and offset between savegame-sessions.
Standardtastenbelegung:
'Myself' ist das aktuelle Fahrzeug RIGHT-CTRL F = FollowMe an/aus schalten RIGHT-CTRL H = Pausieren / Fortsetzen RIGHT-CTRL W/S = Entfernung erhöhen / verringern RIGHT-CTRL A/D = Versatz links / rechts einstellen RIGHT-CTRL X = Versatz zurücksetzen oder reset oder halten für invertieren
'Behind' das folgende Fahrzeug RIGHT-SHIFT F = FollowMe deaktivieren RIGHT-SHIFT H = Pausieren / Fortsetzen RIGHT-SHIFT W/S = Entfernung erhöhen / verringern RIGHT-SHIFT A/D = Versatz links / rechts einstellen RIGHT-SHIFT X = Versatz zurücksetzen oder reset oder halten für invertieren.

description.ru:
Была ли у Вас необходимость в том что-бы какие-либо ТС двигались следом за вами? С "Follow Me" это возможно!
Changelog (1.2.1.40) - Translations updated by contributors. - Support for baler-and-wrapper combination; FBP 3135 (Kuhn DLC). - Increased starting distance to 20, from 10. - Fix for saving/loading distance and offset between savegame-sessions.
Клавиши управления по умолчанию:
'Собственный' это текущая техника RIGHT-CTRL F = Переключение 'FollowMe' Вкл/Выкл RIGHT-CTRL H = Ожидать/Продолжить RIGHT-CTRL W/S = Дистанцию увеличить/уменьшить RIGHT-CTRL A/D = Настройка смещения влево/вправо RIGHT-CTRL X = Сбросить смещение или инвертировать (удерживая)
'За мной' это техника которая едет следом за ведомым RIGHT-SHIFT F = Выключить 'FollowMe' RIGHT-SHIFT H = Ожидать/Продолжить RIGHT-SHIFT W/S = Дистанцию увеличить/уменьшить RIGHT-SHIFT A/D = Настройка смещения влево/вправо RIGHT-SHIFT X = Сбросить смещение или инвертировать (удерживая)
description.it:
Hai mai voluto avere alcuni veicoli che ti seguono per la mappa? Con "Follow Me" è possibile (non ancora con guida in retromarcia).
Changelog (1.2.1.40) - Translations updated by contributors. - Support for baler-and-wrapper combination; FBP 3135 (Kuhn DLC). - Increased starting distance to 20, from 10. - Fix for saving/loading distance and offset between savegame-sessions.
Comandi predefiniti:
'Capo scia' è il veicolo controllato del giocatore CTRL-DESTRO F = 'FollowMe' on/off CTRL-DESTRO H = Aspetta / Riprendi CTRL-DESTRO W/S = Aumenta / Diminuisci distanza CTRL-DESTRO A/D = Scostamento laterale +/- CTRL-DESTRO X = Cancella scostamento o tieni premuto per invertire
'Inseguitore' è il veicolo che segue MAIUSC-DESTRO F = 'FollowMe' on/off MAIUSC-DESTRO H = Aspetta / Riprendi MAIUSC-DESTRO W/S = Aumenta / Diminuisci distanza MAIUSC-DESTRO A/D = Scostamento laterale +/- MAIUSC-DESTRO X = Cancella scostamento o tieni premuto per invertir
